import IWizardStep = xui.IWizardStep;
 
export default class WizardStepController implements IWizardStep {
    public visited:boolean = false;
    public active:boolean = false;
    public complete:boolean = false;
    public label:string;
    public title:string;
    public shortTitle:string;
    public description:string;
    public nextText:string;
    public onEnter:() => void;
    public onExit:() => void;
    public icon:string = "step";
 
    public enter = () => {
        if (angular.isFunction(this.onEnter)) {
            this.onEnter();
        }
 
        this.active = true;
        this.visited = true;
        this.icon = "step-active";
    };
 
    public exit = () => {
        if (angular.isFunction(this.onExit)) {
            this.onExit();
        }
 
        this.active = false;
        this.icon = "step-complete";
    };
}
